translation.en: [woman] Imagine this.
You're in your favorite bookstore,
scanning the shelf where your favorite books reside,
translation.ko: 가장 좋아하는 책들이 꽂힌 책장을 훑어보다가

translation.en: and there…
nestled between the familiar spines sits a red notebook.
translation.ko: 익숙한 책 표지들 사이에서 빨간 노트를 발견한다면

translation.en: Imagine you're in New York and it's Christmas.
You're surrounded by people, by possibility…
and the hope that, somewhere in the city,
is that one person that's meant for you.
translation.ko: 운명의 짝이 있을 거란 희망이 나를 감싼다

translation.en: You just have to find them.
How do you do that?
It all depends on the kind of person you are.
[all] ♪ Joy to the world The Lord has come ♪
♪ Let earth receive her king ♪
[man] It's the most detestable time of the year.
The forced cheer, frenzied crowds.
translation.ko: 즐겁기를 강요하는 분위기 잔뜩 들뜬 사람들

translation.en: The carolers who've had so much eggnog they've forgotten the words.
translation.ko: 에그노그를 너무 많이 마셔서 가사를 까먹은 캐럴 합창대

translation.en: And, of course, the couples naive enough to mistake
holiday spirit for being in love.
I made that mistake once, too.
translation.ko: 나도 그런 착각을 한 적 있다

translation.en: Never again.
Hey!
-Season's greetings! -Oh, come on, tinsel?
translation.ko: - 이봐요! - 메리 크리스마스! 반짝이 다 묻었네

translation.en: [man] The emoji industry has yet to create an icon
translation.ko: "엄마: 공항이야 아빠랑 있어도 정말 괜찮아?" 하와이에서 크리스마스를 보내려는 이혼한 엄마한테서

translation.en: to represent one's feelings about being cast aside
translation.ko: 하와이에서 크리스마스를 보내려는 이혼한 엄마한테서 내팽개쳐진 자식의 감정을 나타내는 이모티콘은

translation.en: by their divorced mother so that she can spend Christmas in Hawaii.
translation.ko: 내팽개쳐진 자식의 감정을 나타내는 이모티콘은 아직 세상에 나오지 않았다

translation.en: That'd be huge in New York.
[man] Well, at least someone knows the words.
translation.ko: 가사 안 까먹은 사람도 있긴 하네

translation.en: [Dash] There is one refuge from the holiday hordes.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 인파로부터 도망칠 수 있는 곳이 한 군데 있다

translation.en: Some bookstores think they need to host a cookie-making class
translation.ko: 어떤 서점은 쿠키 만들기 강좌라도 열어서

translation.en: in order to sell you some Proust.
Not the Strand.
Hey, this was mis-shelved.
translation.ko: 저기요, 이 책 잘못 꽂혀 있었어요

translation.en: Gabriel García Márquez should be under G for García, not M for Márquez.
translation.ko: 가브리엘 가르시아 마르케스는 M이 아니라 G 코너예요

translation.en: And, also, this is biography. It's not fiction. So…
Thanks.
Hey, kid, if you ever wanna work here…
I'll remember this.
Hey, this was also in the wrong section, so…
[woman] Do you dare?
I've left some clues for you. If you want them, turn the page.
translation.ko: 힌트를 받아 문제를 풀고 싶다면 다음 페이지로 넘겨

translation.en: If you don't, put the book back on the shelf.
translation.ko: 싫다면 원래 있던 곳에 다시 꽂아 둬

translation.en: So, you've chosen to play. A revealing choice.
Shall we begin?
A coded message. You can decipher it with the right books.
translation.ko: 암호 메시지야 알맞은 책을 찾으면 해독할 수 있어

translation.en: But only if you can find them.
Your first clue requires some heavy reading.
translation.ko: 첫 번째 힌트는 꽤 읽기 힘든 책이야

translation.en: Look for French pianism.
What the hell is French pianism?
[woman] Oh, and if you need to use your phone, don't bother playing.
translation.ko: 휴대폰으로 검색해 봐야 안다면 이쯤에서 관둬

translation.en: French pianism.
I'm not telling you anything.
But this is the information desk.
Are you not obligated to, like, give me some information?
Look, if this is about earlier, I… apologize.
I know you would never mis-shelve a book.
I don't understand. Did I wrong you?
Did I buy you a James Patterson book for Christmas,
translation.ko: 크리스마스 선물로 제임스 패터슨 책이라도 줬냐고요

translation.en: or are you taking pleasure from my suffering?
translation.ko: 아니면 내가 고통받는 걸 즐기는 거예요?

translation.en: -Could you tell me the section-- -[man] I'm not allowed.
translation.ko: - 어느 코너에 있는지만… - 말할 수 없어

translation.en: I promised her I wouldn't discuss anything related to that.
translation.ko: 그거랑 관련된 얘기는 안 한다고 여자애랑 약속했거든

translation.en: But since you asked, there's a little pleasure.
translation.ko: 물어봤으니 대답하는 건데 약간 즐겁긴 하네

translation.en: You said "her."
-No, I didn't. -[Dash] Yes, you did.
You said "her." She's a her, and she is testing my knowledge of the Strand.
translation.ko: 이 노트 주인은 여자고 내가 이 서점을 얼마나 아는지 시험하고 있군요

translation.en: Thank you for your help.
I didn't help you.
[Dash] Okay, Clue Girl.
If this is how you want to play it…
…game on.
Pianism as in piano, but there's nothing in the music section,
translation.ko: '피아니즘'은 피아노랑 관련 있을 텐데 음악 코너에는 아무것도 없다

translation.en: unless…
heavy reading.
It's a code. Page 88, seventh line, second word.
[woman] Are you…
Am I what?
[woman] Let's make this harder. Fat Hoochie Prom Queen.
translation.ko: 좀 더 어렵게 가볼까? '팻 후치 프롬 퀸'

translation.en: [Dash chuckles] Obviously YA, obviously pink. -Yes. -♪ All I want for Christmas… ♪
translation.ko: 청소년 도서 코너의 분홍색 표지 책이겠지, 좋았어

translation.en: [woman] Your next book isn't a Christmas story,
translation.ko: 다음에 찾을 책은 크리스마스 이야기가 아니지만

translation.en: but Santa does show up to hand out weapons.
Now, presuming you read this as a child, what bothered you about this scene?
translation.ko: 어렸을 때 읽어봤을 거라고 가정하고 물어볼게 그 장면에서 뭐가 거슬렸어?

translation.en: That's easy. Why is jolly St. Nick giving an eight-year-old a knife?
translation.ko: 쉽지, 왜 산타가 8살짜리에게 칼을 주는 거야?

translation.en: [woman] If you said Santa Claus arming an eight-year-old,
this can go on.
Your next clue is inside the most popular title
translation.ko: 다음 단서는 가장 인기 있는 책 안에 있어

translation.en: in Sex and Sexuality.
[woman 2] Dash?
Priya.
-Hey. -I didn't know you were in town.
[Dash] She wouldn't, because we're not friends.
No one's in town. Everyone's off in Bora Bora…
[Dash] Oh, sure,
back when I dated her best friend, we shared a social circle.
translation.ko: 프리야의 절친이랑 사귈 때 인맥을 공유했었지만

translation.en: Now we don't.
…about their presents this year. That's why I'm here.
I'm trying to find a present for my little sister. She's into fantasy.
Yeah, I remember, at your party last year, she challenged me to a duel.
translation.ko: 그래, 작년에 네가 연 파티에서 나한테 결투를 신청했었지

translation.en: About this year, um… I'm… I'm sorry I didn't invite you.
I just… I thought it would be weird, you know, but since you're in town,
translation.ko: 좀 어색할 것 같았거든 근데 이왕 뉴욕에 있으니 파티에 오면 좋겠네

translation.en: you should totally still come. It's on Christmas Eve.
translation.ko: 근데 이왕 뉴욕에 있으니 파티에 오면 좋겠네 크리스마스이브에 해

translation.en: Thanks, but my dad's taking me to Sweden tomorrow.
translation.ko: 고마워, 근데 내일 아빠랑 스웨덴에 가

translation.en: -Sweden. -[Dash] Yeah.
It's supposed to be beautiful in December. All those long Swedish nights.
translation.ko: 12월에 정말 아름답다잖아 기나긴 스웨덴의 밤도 그렇고

translation.en: Right.
Well, that's too bad.
Sofia's coming.
-Sofia's back? -Yeah, just for the holidays.
translation.ko: - 소피아가 뉴욕에 왔어? - 응, 크리스마스 연휴 동안만

translation.en: Anything she should, uh, know?
Tell her I'm trying new things.
Okay.
Hey, wait, Priya, um… Here. For your sister.
I have a feeling she'd like it. It's fantasy for kids with weapons.
translation.ko: 왠지 좋아할 것 같아 아동용 판타지 소설이야 무기도 나오고

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[woman] The fact you were willing to stand in the Strand
translation.ko: '게이 섹스의 즐거움'을 들고 스트랜드에 서 있을 각오를 했다니

translation.en: with The Joy of Gay Sex bodes well for our future.
translation.ko: '게이 섹스의 즐거움'을 들고 스트랜드에 서 있을 각오를 했다니 앞으로도 끄떡없겠어

translation.en: However, a few rules.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 전에 몇 가지 조건이 있어

translation.en: If you are not a teenage boy, please return the notebook to the shelf.
translation.ko: 10대 남자애가 아니라면 노트를 원래 자리에 꽂아 둬

translation.en: if you have use for the manual in your hand, I completely support that.
translation.ko: 손에 든 그 책이 네게 유용하게 쓰인다 해도 난 완전히 응원해

translation.en: Love is a spectrum, but if girls aren't on yours,
translation.ko: 사랑은 다양하니까 하지만 여자가 취향이 아니라면

translation.en: please return the notebook to the shelf.
And finally, if you've made it this far, you're obviously clever,
translation.ko: 마지막으로, 여기까지 왔으니 넌 당연히 똑똑하겠지

translation.en: but I want to know…
are you brave?
Hello.
Um, sorry to interrupt your browsing,
um, but I have been asked to share a dramatic reading.
And apologies to Joni Mitchell.
"It's coming on Christmas." Um…
"They're cutting down trees,
putting up reindeer, singing songs of joy and peace.
translation.ko: '순록 장식을 달고 기쁨과 평화의 노래를 불러요'

translation.en: Oh, I wish I had a river
that I could skate away on."
"But it don't snow here…"
[Dash] Maybe you thought this would scare me off.
But I love this song, and if you chose it, that means you love it, too.
translation.ko: 난 이 노래 좋아해 이 노래를 골랐단 건 너도 좋아한단 뜻이겠지

translation.en: Are you here now?
Did you turn up to see if I had the guts to follow through?
translation.ko: 내게 해낼 배짱이 있는지 보러 왔어?

translation.en: "Oh, I wish I had a river. I'm so hard to handle."
translation.ko: '내게 강이 있다면' '난 참 다루기 어려운 사람이죠'

translation.en: "I'm selfish, and I'm sad."
"And now I've gone and lost the best baby I've ever had."
"Oh, I wish I had a river to skate away on."
translation.ko: '내게 강이 있다면' '스케이트를 타고 멀리 떠날 텐데요'

translation.en: "It's coming on Christmas."
-Whoa! Hey, hey. -I'm putting you out of your misery.
translation.ko: 이봐요! - 고통을 끝내 주는 거야 - 뭐예요?

translation.en: What are you doing? It's not the end of the song.
translation.ko: - 고통을 끝내 주는 거야 - 뭐예요? - 아직 노래 안 끝났는데 - 필요한 건 나왔어

translation.en: Got what you needed.
translation.ko: - 아직 노래 안 끝났는데 - 필요한 건 나왔어

translation.en: The last two words of the message? You just said them.
translation.ko: 아까 마지막으로 뱉은 말에 메시지의 해답이 있어

translation.en: [woman] Are you going to be lonely on Christmas?
translation.ko: 너는 올해 크리스마스를 홀로 보낼 거야?

translation.en: So, here we are. What happens next is up to you.
translation.ko: 이제 게임은 끝났어 다음 일은 네가 하기에 달렸지

translation.en: Leave a message telling me how this time of year makes you feel.
translation.ko: 매년 이맘때가 너에게 어떤 느낌인지 적어 줘

translation.en: If I like your answer, you just might hear from me.
translation.ko: 답변이 마음에 들면 내가 다시 답장할지도 몰라

translation.en: If you're not scared.
Who is she?
Even if I could tell you, I wouldn't.
You have to put that back so someone else can play.
translation.ko: 다른 사람도 할 수 있게 책장에 다시 꽂아 놔

translation.en: Hey! I said leave it.
[Dash] I'm not scared, Clue Girl.
I'm hooked.
Dude! You're going to Sweden, and you didn't tell me?
translation.ko: 야! 스웨덴에 가면서 나한테 말을 안 했어?

translation.en: How'd you…?
Oh, Priya.
Yeah. She texted and said you were acting weird. Like, even for you.
translation.ko: 그래, 네가 이상하게 군다고 문자 보냈더라 너인 걸 감안해도 이상하다고

translation.en: She say anything else?
Just so you know, I'm a total ally.
[chuckles] I appreciate that, Boomer, but I'm still straight.
translation.ko: 고마워, 부머 근데 난 아직 이성애자야

translation.en: And I'm not going to Sweden.
I'm just trying to avoid seeing anyone over the break.
translation.ko: 연휴 동안 아무도 안 만나려고 핑계 댄 거야

translation.en: What, even me?
No, man. Need you for the pizza.
translation.ko: 그럴 리가 네가 있어야 피자를 먹지

translation.en: Oh, great. [laughs]
Yeah. So, what's the Boomer clan doing for Christmas?
Oh, it's gonna be sick.
So, you know my aunt who works for the Food Network?
She's bringing over all the food that was too weird-looking to be on TV.
translation.ko: 못생겨서 방송에 못 나가는 음식을 전부 집에 가져오겠대

translation.en: You gotta let me know when you open your presents.
Why?
Well, because I helped your mom pick yours out.
translation.ko: 너희 어머니가 네 선물 고르는 걸 도와드렸거든

translation.en: -You gotta give me a hint. -What?
-No. I'm not gonna tell you what it is. -You gotta give me a hint. Give me a hint!
translation.ko: - 싫어, 안 말해줄 거야 - 힌트만 줘

translation.en: Okay, you know those life-size Japanese robots that fight each other?
translation.ko: 서로 싸우는 사람만 한 일본 로봇 알아?

translation.en: -No. -It's not that.
-[laughs] -I'm… I'm gonna get you back.
[woman] Are you going to be lonely on Christmas?
translation.ko: 너는 올해 크리스마스를 홀로 보낼 거야?

translation.en: What's that? You got a diary?
Oh, no. I just found it at the Strand. Um…
You don't recognize this handwriting, do you?
Yeah. Oh, yeah, that's a girl.
Yeah, that's definitely girl cursive right there.
Okay, but that's not Priya's, right?
Pretty sure Priya only writes on her phone. Why?
translation.ko: 프리야는 휴대폰으로만 글 쓸걸, 근데 왜?

translation.en: Oh, I'm just ruling out suspects.
Uh, 'cause it had these clues, like a treasure hunt,
and I've just been wondering about the girl who wrote it.
translation.ko: 이걸 쓴 여자가 누군지 궁금해서 그래

translation.en: Ooh, you like her.
Boomer, we're not in third grade. We don't say, "Ooh, you like her."
-But you do. -No, I don't even know her.
Which is why it's even weirder that you like her.
translation.ko: 그러니까 좋아한다는 게 더 이상한 거지

translation.en: I mean, I haven't heard you talk about a girl since…
translation.ko: 네가 여자 얘기 하는 건 그 애 이후로…

translation.en: Yep, you can say her name, Boomer. She's not Voldemort.
translation.ko: 이름 말해도 돼, 부머 볼드모트도 아니고

translation.en: Actually, you're supposed to say Voldemort's name. It takes away his power.
translation.ko: 사실 볼드모트 이름은 말하는 게 좋아 그러면 그의 힘이 약해지거든

translation.en: Okay, look, I don't even know if I want to know this girl.
translation.ko: 어쨌든, 얘를 더 알고 싶은지도 확실하지 않아

translation.en: I would just like to figure out who she is.
Done. We set up a sting operation.
Yeah. Okay, you send her a message telling her to order pizza from Two Boots.
translation.ko: '투 부츠'에서 피자 주문하라고 메시지를 전하는 거야

translation.en: When she calls and places it, boom, we got her name.
translation.ko: 여기로 주문 전화가 오면 이름을 알 수 있지

translation.en: It's… it's all there.
I will consider that.
-I'm gonna get this. -That looks cool. What's that?
It's a depressing French film about murder.
All right, thanks for the pizza, Boomer.
Shit!
Hey, Dad, did you change your alarm code for your apartment?
Yeah, no, I am spending the break with Mom.
But I just figure if I need a place to get away to read.
translation.ko: 조용히 책 읽을 공간이 필요할 때를 대비해서요

translation.en: Or sure, bring a special lady. Yeah.
translation.ko: 그래요, 특별한 여자애를 데려올 수도 있고요, 네

translation.en: Okay.
Great. I am writing it down now.
[alarm voice] Disarmed.
[sighs] No, I am not gonna touch the brandy, Dad.
[Dash] My mom thinks I'm spending the holiday with my dad.
translation.ko: 엄마는 내가 크리스마스 연휴를 아빠랑 보낸다고 생각한다

translation.en: My dad thinks I'm with my mom,
translation.ko: 아빠는 내가 엄마랑 있는 줄 안다

translation.en: and my classmates think I'm out of the city.
translation.ko: 반 친구들은 내가 뉴욕을 벗어난 줄 안다

translation.en: It's my Christmas gift to myself.
Solitude.
[Sofia] What are you thinking about?
The word… "bedding."
You American boys have the stupidest pillow talk.
translation.ko: 미국 남자애들은 침대에서 이상한 얘기를 하더라

translation.en: No, hear me out. It's one of those words
where it's just either really sexy, you know, or it's really not, like, um…
translation.ko: 정말 섹시하기도 하고 어쩔 땐 정말 아니기도 해

translation.en: Can you show me to the bedding department? Right? It's not sexy.
But then if you make it into a verb, like--
Are we going to be bedding each other?
Mmm. See, that's very sexy.
I'm going to miss you.
I'm not going anywhere.
Are you?
My dad got a new post. Brazil.
translation.ko: 아빠 새 직장 때문에 브라질로 떠나

translation.en: I'm sorry. We both knew this was never going to last forever.
translation.ko: 미안해 우리 사이가 평생 갈 거라곤 생각 안 했잖아

translation.en: There you are. Can you stop hiding, love birds?
translation.ko: 여기 있었네 그만 숨어, 커플들아 파티를 즐겨야지

translation.en: It's a party.
[Dash] You asked me how this time of year makes me feel.
translation.ko: 매년 이맘때가 나한테 어떤 느낌인지 물었지?

translation.en: I suspect you're a kindred spirit, so I know you'll understand when I say,
translation.ko: 넌 나랑 비슷한 부류인 것 같으니 이렇게 말하면 이해하겠지

translation.en: it's the most detestable time of the year.
I knew it. Sting operation.
No. Please don't call it that. Just listen, okay?
translation.ko: 함정 수사라고 하지 마 그냥 들어봐

translation.en: -You listening? -Yeah.
The clues are gonna instruct her
translation.ko: 걔가 내 말을 따른다면 여기 비디오 판매대에

translation.en: to leave the notebook on one the shelves in the video section.
translation.ko: 걔가 내 말을 따른다면 여기 비디오 판매대에 노트를 꽂으러 올 거야

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
All you need to do is just keep an eye out for her, all right?
translation.ko: 넌 그냥 걔가 오는지 주시하고 있으면 돼, 알았어?

translation.en: So, you can know she is without her knowing who you are?
translation.ko: 걔한텐 너를 안 들키면서 너만 걔 정체를 알아내려고?

translation.en: Isn't that kind of sneaky and not cool?
Fine, we can call it a sting operation.
Awesome. Yes. [laughs]
All right, guys, we got our holiday special.
We call it the St. Nick. It's in honor Nicolas Cage.
translation.ko: 메뉴명은 '세인트 닉'이에요 니컬러스 케이지를 찬양하는 뜻에서요

translation.en: How did you miss her?
-It was the lunch rush. -What about the security cameras?
What security cameras?
-You said that it was a sting operation. -Yeah, but this is also a pizza parlor.
translation.ko: - 함정 수사라며 - 응, 근데 여긴 피자 가게거든

translation.en: -Uh, she left you a message. -What?
[woman] Nice try.
You sent me into a trap.
Dude. What? How could she possibly know that?
translation.ko: 야, 이것 봐 그걸 어떻게 눈치챘지?

translation.en: Uh, it gets worse. Like, way worse.
[woman] I'm flattered, Mystery Boy, but I'm not so easy to catch.
translation.ko: 미스터리 소년, 노력은 가상하지만 난 그리 쉽게 잡히지 않아

translation.en: If you wanna know more about me,
you'll have to do it through this notebook.
And if you want my name, you'll have to earn it… with a dare.
translation.ko: 내 이름을 알고 싶으면 미션을 통과해야 하고

translation.en: [Boomer] Maybe this is a bad idea. I mean, you don't even know this girl.
translation.ko: 좋은 생각이 아닌 것 같아 알지도 못하는 애잖아

translation.en: She could be totally different than what you think.
translation.ko: 네 예상이랑 완전히 다를 수도 있어

translation.en: That's the thing, Boomer. I do know her.
When I read her words, it's like I can hear her voice.
translation.ko: 걔가 쓴 글을 읽으면 목소리가 들리는 듯해

translation.en: She's sarcastic, sophisticated…
-sadistic. -Sadistic?
She's sending me into a department store right before Christmas.
Clearly, her sadism knows no bounds.
-Just be nice to Santa. Please? -Yep.
You can kick me out without actually kicking me.
translation.ko: 꼭 발로 걷어차면서 쫓아낼 것까진 없잖아요

translation.en: Consider yourself banned from Santa Land for life.
We actually do not have that authority, but you should be ashamed of yourself.
translation.ko: 사실 그럴 권한은 없지만 어쨌든 부끄러운 줄 알아

translation.en: And you're on the naughty list.
Well, I hope climate change destroys the North Pole.
[Dash] Okay, Clue Girl, I did your dare,
and it only cost me my dignity.
So, let's find out what I learned.
What? No, what? Come on. What did I do wrong?
translation.ko: 뭐야? 이럴 리가 내가 뭘 잘못했는데?

translation.en: I did everything you asked, and I still don't know your…
Lily.
Her name's Lily.
[woman] Lily!
Lily! Lily, thank God you're here.
-Is it bad? -Without you? They're terrible.
translation.ko: - 많이 심각해요? - 너 없으니까 재앙이 따로 없어

translation.en: -Hey! Seriously? -Season's greetings.
Oh, it's Lily. We're saved.
-Sorry I'm late. -We drank all the eggnog.
I was looking for these.
"Joy to the World," third verse. We need you, badly.
[Dash] Well, at least someone knows the words.
translation.ko: 가사 안 까먹은 사람도 있긴 하네

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause they're welcome here today… ♪
